forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. South southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens over Downtown San Francisco, the city rests under a blanket of partly cloudy skies, the cool air whispering the promises of a mild morning just hours away. With temperatures dipping to around 54 degrees, the gentle south-southwest wind stirs, beckoning you to wrap yourself in a light jacket if you venture out. 

Emerging from the twilight, Wednesday unfolds bright and clear, heralding a sunny day with highs nudging near a comfortable 70 degrees. The breeze picks up, dancing through the streets at 3 to 16 mph, bringing with it a hint of energy that invigorates even the earliest of risers. The beauty of the day lies in its clarity—a stark contrast to the foggy embrace often seen in summer months. Though some may linger near the edges of the coastline, it appears to make way for unencumbered views of the iconic skyline and the distant hills. In this delightful weather, consider taking a stroll along the Embarcadero or losing yourself in the tranquility of Golden Gate Park, where the sunshine will coax the flowers to brighten in tandem with your spirit. As you bask in this pleasant day, a comfortable outfit layered with a light sweater will see you through whatever breezy surprises may come, making the city’s rich tapestry of experiences unfurl beautifully before you.
